p.codeblock: virtual int searchMusic(agora::util::AString& requestId, const char* keyWord, int32_t page, int32_t pageSize, const char* jsonOption = nullptr) = 0;
abstract searchMusic( requestId: string, keyWord: string, page: number, pageSize: number, jsonOption?: string ): number;
public abstract int SearchMusic(ref string requestId, string keyWord, int page, int pageSize, string jsonOption = "");
abstract searchMusic( requestId: string, keyWord: string, page: number, pageSize: number, jsonOption?: string ): number;
Future<String> searchMusic( {required String keyWord, required int page, required int pageSize, String? jsonOption});

section.title: Details
section.p: After calling this method successfully, the SDK triggers the callback to report the list of search results.

plentry.pd: 搜索关键词，支持歌曲名、歌手搜索。
The page number of the searched music.
The number of music displayed on each page. The maximum value is 50.

plentry.pd: The json field. The default value is .

section.title: Returns
